title: Letters to Barron’s
text:
Streaming Wars

To the Editor: As to which streaming service will emerge as No. 1 (“Television’s Big Test,” Cover Story, Oct. 18), it seems that Walt Disney would probably be at or near the top, insofar as it has the solid income of its theme parks, a seemingly unending cascade of Marvel Comics, Lucasfilm, and Pixar movies, as well as its own library.

Then add 21st Century Fox’s sports channels and prolific content of movies and TV shows, plus its controlling stake in Hulu. Disney’s market is the world—and what parent or...
description: Letters on the streaming wars, a wealth tax alternative, Boeing’s woes, and Medigap plans
